home.title: Authentic Yemeni Taste
home.subtitle: In Yemen Gate, We offer authentic Yemeni food and adhere to health and quality standards in the selection of ingredients and in the method of preparation. Our kitchen is distinguished by its flavor, freshness and special spices. Traditional dishes are our signature, our hospitality and gratitude are our nature
home.occations_title: Special Events and Catering Services - Celebrate With Us
home.occations_subtitle: Oud concerts in Ottawa (musical), wedding or engagement hosting service, event catering, Ramadan iftar, annual holidays, and more. Yemen Gate restaurants are the most suitable and lovely place for family and friends, as the distinctive atmosphere, delicious food, warm welcome, and hospitality create precious memories and unforgettable moments for everyone
home.review_text: Discover why our diners love Yemen Gate! Our reviews reflect our dedication to excellence and authenticity. Whether it's a family dinner or a quick bite, our guests leave with smiles and satisfied appetites

slider.slide_1_title: Authentic Yemeni Cuisine - Best Yemeni restaurant in Ottawa and Orleans
slider.slide_1_subtitle: Delve into the heart of Yemen with each bite at Yemen Gate. One of the best restaurants in Ottawa and Orleans, our restaurant offers a culinary journey with traditional dishes prepared using age-old recipes and the finest ingredients (Halal) like Mandi rice, lamb Haneeth, liver, banana dessert, Adani chai (Karak), and more
slider.slide_2_subtitle: Yemen Gate is your gateway to Yemeni culture and history through its authentic culinary heritage. We honor tradition with every dish, using locally sourced ingredients and time-honored techniques.
slider.slide_3_subtitle: At Yemen Gate, culinary tradition is infused with a commitment to quality. We source the freshest ingredients and employ time-honored techniques to bring you dishes that not only taste exceptional but also resonate with the rich culinary history of Yemen

oat_soup.title: Oat Soup
oat_soup.description: A comforting, creamy soup made with oats and mild spices.

lentil_soup.title: Lentil Soup
lentil_soup.description: Hearty and flavourful, made with lentils and aromatic Yemeni spices.

maraq.title: Maraq
maraq.description: A rich and flavourful Yemeni broth infused with herbs and spices.

signature_salad.title: Green Salad
signature_salad.description: Fresh mixed greens with cucumbers, tomatoes, and a light dressing.

fattoush.title: Fattoush
fattoush.description: A Levantine-style salad with crispy pita chips, sumac, and fresh vegetables.

cucumber_yogurt_salad.title: Cucumber Yogurt Salad
cucumber_yogurt_salad.description: Cool and creamy yogurt mixed with cucumbers, mint, and garlic.

tabeekh.title: Vegetable Mix Stew
tabeekh.description: Stewed vegetables, potatoes, carrots, and zucchini in tomato sauce.

mulukhiyah_soup.title: Mulukhiyah Soup
mulukhiyah_soup.description: Soft mallow leaves with broth, garlic, and coriander.

okra_soup.title: Okra Soup
okra_soup.description: Okra with tomatoes, garlic, broth, and spices.

hummus.title: Hummus
hummus.description: Chickpeas, tahini, lemon, garlic, and hot pepper, served with pita bread.

fahsa.title: Fahsa
fahsa.description: Slow-cooked shredded beef stew with fenugreek foam, served with pita bread.

qilabat_meat.title: Qilabat Meat
qilabat_meat.description: Tender, slow-cooked Yemeni spiced cubed meat served with pita bread.

liver.title: Liver
liver.description: Sautéed liver with aromatic spices, served with pita bread.

dry_pot_beans.title: Fasolia Nashif
dry_pot_beans.description: Sautéed fava beans with Yemeni spices, onions, and tomatoes. Served with pita bread.

beans_mudara.title: Fava Beans (Foule) Mudara
beans_mudara.description: Slow-cooked fava beans seasoned with garlic, cumin, and olive oil. Served with pita bread. Tahini optional.

shakshouka.title: Shakshouka
shakshouka.description: Scrambled eggs with tomatoes, peppers, and spices, served with pita bread.

yemeni_foul.title: Yemeni Foule
yemeni_foul.description: Consists of fava beans with tahini, in addition to vegetables, tomatoes and garlic

salta.title: Salta
salta.description: Traditional Yemeni stew with vegetables, and a spicy fenugreek sauce, served with pita bread.

tuna_salta.title: Tuna Salta
tuna_salta.description: A seafood twist on Salta, featuring fresh tuna in a rich, spiced sauce. Served with pita bread.

lamb_pot.title: Lamb Pot
lamb_pot.description: Consists of lamb broth, potato and lamb pieces

lamb_mandi.title: Lamb Mandi
lamb_mandi.description: A fragrant rice dish infused with Yemeni spices, topped with fried onions, almonds, and raisins, and served with our signature hot sauce (Sahawiq).

chicken_mandi.title: Chicken Mandi
chicken_mandi.description: Tender chicken slow-cooked with fragrant rice, Yemeni spices, and garnished with fried onions, almonds, and raisins, served with Sahawiq.

lamb_haneeth.title: Slow Roasted Lamb (Haneeth)
lamb_haneeth.description: Slow-roasted lamb served over steamed basmati rice infused with Yemeni spices, topped with almonds and raisins.

family_mix_mandi.title: Family Mix Mandi
family_mix_mandi.description: A generous mix of Mandi and Haneeth lamb & chicken over Yemeni spiced rice, topped with fried onions, almonds, and raisins, with Sahawiq.

family_mandi_lamb.title: Family Mandi Lamb
family_mandi_lamb.description: A fragrant rice dish infused with Yemeni spices, topped with fried onions, almonds, and raisins, and served with our signature hot sauce (Sahawiq).

shrimp.title: Grilled shrimp
shrimp.description: A rich and flovourful shrimp stew served sizzling in a clay pot, paired Rashosh.

fish.title: Tandoori Fish
fish.description: Perfectly spiced and grilled fish, served with Rashoosh and cheese, accompanied by Sahawiq.

mandi_chicken_burrito.title: Chicken mandi burrito
mandi_chicken_burrito.description: A fusion of Yemeni and Mexican flavours! A warm tortilla filled with Mandi chicken & rice, sweet corn, fried onions, tomatoes, and lettuce, topped with a burrito sauce.

mandi_lamb_burrito.title: Lamb mandi burrito
mandi_lamb_burrito.description: A fusion of Yemeni and Mexican flavours! A warm tortilla filled with Mandi lamb & rice, sweet corn, fried onions, tomatoes, and lettuce, topped with a burrito sauce.

shrimp_burrito.title: Shrimp burrito
shrimp_burrito.description: A fusion of Yemeni and Mexican flavours! A warm tortilla filled with shrimp, Mandi rice, sweet corn, fried onions, tomatoes, and lettuce, topped with a burrito sauce.

maasoub.title: Ma'asoub
maasoub.description: Banana bread pudding topped with white cream, black seeds, and honey.

areeka.title: Areeka
areeka.description: Date bread pudding topped with white cream, black seeds, almonds, and honey.

date_fattah.title: Date Fattah
date_fattah.description: Date bread pudding served with honey.

knafeh.title: Künafe
knafeh.description: Spun pastry, sugar syrup, and layered with cheese

adani_tea.title: Adani Tea
adani_tea.description: Black Tea with Milk. Made with Yemeni Spices

red_tea.title: Red Tea
red_tea.description: Tea leaves dissolve in water, sugar, and mint

ayran.title: Ayran
ayran.description: A cold savory yogurt-based beverage of yogurt and water

turkish_coffee.title: Turkish Coffee
turkish_coffee.description: Roasted coffee beans dissolved and concentrated with boiling water

black_coffee.title: Black Coffee
black_coffee.description: Roasted and ground coffee beans dissolve in water

lemon_juice.title: lemon Juice
lemon_juice.description: Freshly squeezed lemon and mint slices

signature_cocktail.title: Signature Cocktail
signature_cocktail.description: A mixture or mango, apple, banana, date paste concentrated milk and halva

sahawiq.title: Sahawiq
sahawiq.description: Tomatoes and hot peppers, with some spices added

mandi_rice.title: Mandi Rice
mandi_rice.description: Mandi rice, topped with onions, almond and raisins

rashoosh_bread.title: Rashoosh Bread
rashoosh_bread.description: Flour with butter and black seeds

cheese_hot_sauce.title: Cheese hot sauce
cheese_hot_sauce.description: Tomatoes, cheese and hot peppers, with some spices added

catering_mandi_lamb.title: Mandi Lamb
catering_mandi_lamb.description: A fragrant rice dish infused with Yemeni spices, topped with fried onions, almonds, and raisins, and served with our signature hot sauce (Sahawiq).
